name: Hint Leading Join Order
description: Force specific join order and direction using Leading hint.

example.after_sql:
/*+ Leading((d1 (d2 f))) */
      SELECT * FROM fact f
      JOIN dim1 d1 ON f.d1_id = d1.id
      JOIN dim2 d2 ON f.d2_id = d2.id;
      
      -- Leading format:
      -- Leading(t1 t2 t3)       -- order only
      -- Leading((t1 (t2 t3)))   -- t2 joins t3 first, then t1
example.key_insight:
Need precise control over join order for star schema or complex
      multi-table queries.
